org.apache.giraph.metrics

类 SuperstepMetricsRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.metrics.GiraphMetricsRegistry
      • org.apache.giraph.metrics.SuperstepMetricsRegistry

  • public class SuperstepMetricsRegistry
extends GiraphMetricsRegistry
    Wrapper around MetricsRegistry for per-superstep metrics.

    • 构造器概要

    • 构造器详细资料

      • SuperstepMetricsRegistry

        protected SuperstepMetricsRegistry(com.yammer.metrics.core.MetricsRegistry registry,
                        com.yammer.metrics.reporting.JmxReporter reporter,
                        String groupName,
                        String type)
        Constructor
        参数:
        registry - MetricsRegistry to use
        reporter - JmxReporter to use
        groupName - String grouping for metrics
        type - String type name for metrics

    • 方法详细资料

      • create

        public static SuperstepMetricsRegistry create(GiraphConfiguration conf,
                              long superstep)
        Create with Hadoop Configuration and superstep number.
        参数:
        conf - Hadoop Configuration to use.
        superstep - number of superstep to use as group for metrics.
        返回:
        new metrics registry

      • createFake

        public static SuperstepMetricsRegistry createFake()
        Create an empty registry
        返回:
        fake metrics registry that returns no op metrics

      • getSuperstep

        public long getSuperstep()
        Get superstep stored here
        返回:
        long superstep

      • setSuperstep

        public void setSuperstep(long superstep)
        Set superstep number used. Internally sets the group for metrics created.
        参数:
        superstep - long number of superstep to use.

      • printSummary

        public void printSummary(PrintStream out)
        Print human readable summary of superstep metrics.
        参数:
        out - PrintStream to write to.
